content:
{"name": "New York Common Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Log in here to order online https://nycppantry.unicentric.com/Logon?ReturnUrl=%2f
*  **Choice Pantry Program** 
	* Offers fresh, culturally appropriate and nutritious food free to participants who qualify.
	* Pantry packages are supplemental grocery packages in five food categories: protein, dairy, grains, fruits and vegetables, proportional to the number of individuals in the family and provided every two weeks.
	* Please bring photo ID for all adults in the household, ID for all children in the household, e.g., birth certificate, school letter, and proof of address, e.g., rent receipt or lease.
	
* **Hot Meals/Brown Bag Lunches Program** provides hot, nutritionally balanced meals to our guests during weekdays and a sandwich, snack and beverage for take-away during weekends.  Everyone is welcome.

", "email": "", "url": "https://nycommonpantry.org/home/food-programs-2/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "8 East 109th Street", "address_2": "Ground Floor", "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10029", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.795809, "longitude": -73.9492356}, "phones": [{"number": "(917) 720-9700", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "18:30", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "18:30", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "18:30", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "18:30", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "18:30", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "21:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "21:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Will be given a Pantry ID upon registration"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once Every 2 weeks"}]}
